nodes.text: Grysk warriors, also known as Grysk marauders or Grysk soldiers, were armored Grysk soldiers. They were involved in several engagements with the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Atollon. They used lightning guns as well as pellet guns. They also made use of armor and helmets, which had curves on the left half and a distorted right half. Rumors stated that the warriors overwhelmed their opponents by sheer numbers and ferocity, but Grand Admiral Thrawn believed it not to be true.
